projects.title: Google clone
projects.description:
I Built a Google clone with HTML and CSS in just 2 days. It was very nice and enjoyable but sometimes it felt like i couldn't do this. But I believed in HTML and tried again and again and one fine day I finally built a Google clone. 
If you guys think I am joking then check my project URL.

projects.description: Yes, the Amazon shopping website was built by me but he(you know whom) stole my code.
